title: Silk screen techniques
creator_credit: Durrell R. Crays and Bailey Film Productions
brief_description: Shows four advanced silk screen techniques, demonstrated by professional artists: the clay touche method, the glue touche process, the lacquer film technique, and the photo film technique.
